definition: (of especially money) immediately available, poised for action, make ready or suitable or equip in advance for a particular purpose or for some use, event, etc
details:
adjective
- (of especially money) immediately available
- apprehending and responding with speed and sensitivity
= synonyms: quick
- made suitable and available for immediate use
= example: made suitable and available for immediate use
- completely prepared or in condition for immediate action or use or progress
= example: completely prepared or in condition for immediate action or use or progress
- mentally disposed
= example: mentally disposed
noun
- poised for action
= example: poised for action
verb
- make ready or suitable or equip in advance for a particular purpose or for some use, event, etc
= example: make ready or suitable or equip in advance for a particular purpose or for some use, event, etc
= synonyms: prepare, set up, gear up, set, fix
- prepare for eating by applying heat
= synonyms: fix
